newsitem.title: USA: Most IMM currencies up, Can dlrs, pesos cut losses.
newsitem.headline: Most IMM currencies up, Can dlrs, pesos cut losses.

text.p: Nov 7 - Most IMM currency futures were higher, with Canadian dollars and Mexican pesos cutting losses in afternoon trade. Dec Can dollars set a contract high of $0.7545. Talk is circulating that BOC may ease Can rates on Friday. Pesos trimmed declines to $0.123000 on 1997 budget proposal. Net spending to rise 5.2 pct vs 1996. -Derivatives Desk(312)408-8750/E-mail:derivatives@reuters.com
